name: DerivedCategory.instIsHomologicalHomologyFunctor
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
inst✝ : HasDerivedCategory C
n : Int
⊢ (DerivedCategory.homologyFunctor C n).IsHomological
decl:
instance (n : ℤ) : (homologyFunctor C n).IsHomological :=
  Functor.isHomological_of_localization Qh
    (homologyFunctor C n) _ (homologyFunctorFactorsh C n)

name: DerivedCategory.HomologySequence.comp_δ_assoc
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
inst✝ : HasDerivedCategory C
T : CategoryTheory.Pretriangulated.Triangle (DerivedCategory C)
hT : Membership.mem CategoryTheory.Pretriangulated.distinguishedTriangles T
n₀ n₁ : Int
h✝ : Eq (HAdd.hAdd n₀ 1) n₁
Z : C
h : Quiver.Hom ((DerivedCategory.homologyFunctor C n₁).obj T.obj₁) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((DerivedCategory.homologyFunctor C n₀).map T.mor₂) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (DerivedCategory.HomologySequence.δ T n₀ n₁ h✝) h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp 0 h)
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
lemma comp_δ : (homologyFunctor C n₀).map T.mor₂ ≫ δ T n₀ n₁ h = 0 :=
  (homologyFunctor C 0).comp_homologySequenceδ _ hT _ _ h

⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((DerivedCategory.homologyFunctor C n₀).map T.mor₂) (DerivedCategory.HomologySequence.δ T n₀ n₁ h)) 0
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
lemma comp_δ : (homologyFunctor C n₀).map T.mor₂ ≫ δ T n₀ n₁ h = 0 :=

name: DerivedCategory.HomologySequence.exact₂
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
inst✝ : HasDerivedCategory C
T : CategoryTheory.Pretriangulated.Triangle (DerivedCategory C)
hT : Membership.mem CategoryTheory.Pretriangulated.distinguishedTriangles T
n₀ : Int
⊢ (CategoryTheory.ShortComplex.mk ((DerivedCategory.homologyFunctor C n₀).map T.mor₁) ((DerivedCategory.homologyFunctor C n₀).map T.mor₂) ⋯).Exact
decl:
lemma exact₂ :
    (ShortComplex.mk ((homologyFunctor C n₀).map T.mor₁) ((homologyFunctor C n₀).map T.mor₂)
      (by simp only [← Functor.map_comp, comp_distTriang_mor_zero₁₂ _ hT,
        Functor.map_zero])).Exact :=
  (homologyFunctor C 0).homologySequence_exact₂ _ hT _

name: DerivedCategory.HomologySequence.exact₃
initialProofState:

inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
inst✝ : HasDerivedCategory C
T : CategoryTheory.Pretriangulated.Triangle (DerivedCategory C)
hT : Membership.mem CategoryTheory.Pretriangulated.distinguishedTriangles T
n₀ n₁ : Int
h : Eq (HAdd.hAdd n₀ 1) n₁
⊢ (CategoryTheory.ShortComplex.mk ((DerivedCategory.homologyFunctor C n₀).map T.mor₂) (DerivedCategory.HomologySequence.δ T n₀ n₁ h) ⋯).Exact
decl:
lemma exact₃ : (ShortComplex.mk _ _ (comp_δ T hT n₀ n₁ h)).Exact :=
  (homologyFunctor C 0).homologySequence_exact₃ _ hT _ _ h

name: DerivedCategory.HomologySequence.exact₁

hT : Membership.mem CategoryTheory.Pretriangulated.distinguishedTriangles T
n₀ n₁ : Int
h : Eq (HAdd.hAdd n₀ 1) n₁
⊢ (CategoryTheory.ShortComplex.mk (DerivedCategory.HomologySequence.δ T n₀ n₁ h) ((DerivedCategory.homologyFunctor C n₁).map T.mor₁) ⋯).Exact
decl:
lemma exact₁ : (ShortComplex.mk _ _ (δ_comp T hT n₀ n₁ h)).Exact :=
  (homologyFunctor C 0).homologySequence_exact₁ _ hT _ _ h

lemma epi_homologyMap_mor₁_iff :
